  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 5.75pt; text-indent: 0in"></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 5.75pt; text-indent: 0in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: italic 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-indent: 0in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt; font-style: normal">Section 1.03</font><font style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;<i>Rules of Construction</i>.</font></p>
  <p style="font: italic 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-indent: 0in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">Unless the context otherwise requires:</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">(1)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;a term has the meaning assigned to it;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">(2)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;an accounting term not otherwise defined has the meaning assigned to it in
      accordance with GAAP;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">(3)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#8220;or&#8221; is not exclusive;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">(4)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;words in the singular include the plural, and in the plural include the
      singular;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">(5)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#8220;will&#8221; shall be interpreted to express a command;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">(6)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;provisions apply to successive events and transactions;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">(7)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#8220;including&#8221; means &#8220;including, without limitation&#8221;;</font></p>
  <p style="FONT: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; MARGIN: 0pt 0px">&#160;</p>
  <div id="DSPFPageBreakArea" style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both; MARGIN-TOP: 10pt">
    <div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center">&#160;</div>
    <div id="DSPFPageNumberArea" style="text-align: center;"><font id="DSPFPageNumber" style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal;">-2-</font></div>
    <div id="DSPFPageBreak" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
      <hr noshade="noshade" style="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; MARGIN: 4px 0px; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0px; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000"> </div>
  </div>
  <!--PROfilePageNumberReset%Num%2%-%-%-->
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">(8)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;references to sections of or rules under the Securities Act will be deemed
      to include substitute, replacement or successor sections or rules adopted by the SEC from time to time;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">(9)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;all references, in any context, to any interest or other amount payable on
      or with respect to the Notes of any Series shall be deemed to include an Additional Interest pursuant to the Registration Rights Agreement; and</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">(10)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;the phrases &#8220;in writing&#8221; or &#8220;written&#8221; as used herein shall be deemed to
      include PDFs, e-emails and other electronic means of Transmission, unless otherwise indicated.</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-transform: uppercase; text-align: center; text-indent: 0in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">Article II<br>
      THE Additional NOTES</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-transform: uppercase; text-align: center; text-indent: 0in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: italic 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-indent: 0in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt; font-style: normal">Section 2.01</font><font style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;<i>Terms of Additional Notes</i><font style="font-style: normal">.</font></font></p>
  <p style="font: italic 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-indent: 0in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-indent: 1in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">The Additional Notes shall have the terms set forth in Section 2.03 of the Ninth Supplemental
      Indenture except as modified by the following:</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-indent: 1in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;The aggregate principal amount of Additional Notes, which shall be authenticated
      and delivered on the Additional Notes Issue Date under the Indenture, shall be $750,000,000;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;The Additional Notes issued on the Additional Notes Issue Date will be issued at
      an issue price of 104.318% of the principal amount thereof.</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: italic 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-indent: 0in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt; font-style: normal">Section 2.02&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;</font><font style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><i>Agreement to Guarantee</i>.</font></p>
  <p style="font: italic 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-indent: 0in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">The Guarantors hereby agree, jointly and severally, to unconditionally guarantee the Issuer&#8217;s
      obligations under the Additional Notes and the Indenture on the terms and subject to the conditions set forth in the Indenture including but not limited to ARTICLE X of the Base Indenture.</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-transform: uppercase; text-align: center; text-indent: 0in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">Article III<br>
      MISCELLANEOUS</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-transform: uppercase; text-align: center; text-indent: 0in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: italic 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-indent: 0in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt; font-style: normal">Section 3.01&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><i>Effect of the Eleventh Supplemental Indenture</i>.</font></p>
  <p style="font: italic 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-indent: 0in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;This Eleventh Supplemental Indenture is a supplemental indenture within the
      meaning of Section 2.02 of the Base Indenture, and the Original Indenture shall (notwithstanding Section 12.12 of the Base Indenture or Section 3.04 hereof) be read together with this Eleventh Supplemental Indenture and shall have the same effect
      over the Additional Notes, in the same manner as if the provisions of the Original Indenture and this Eleventh Supplemental Indenture were contained in the same instrument.</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;In all other respects, the Original Indenture is confirmed by the parties hereto
      as supplemented by the terms of this Eleventh Supplemental Indenture.&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="FONT: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; MARGIN: 0pt 0px">&#160;</p>
  <div id="DSPFPageBreakArea" style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both; MARGIN-TOP: 10pt">
    <div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font id="DSPFPageNumber" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif; font-weight: normal; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-style: normal;">-3-</font>&#160;</div>
    <div id="DSPFPageBreak" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
      <hr noshade="noshade" style="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; MARGIN: 4px 0px; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0px; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000"> </div>
  </div>
  <p style="font: italic 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-indent: 0in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt; font-style: normal">Section 3.02&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><i>Governing Law</i>.</font></p>
  <p style="font: italic 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-indent: 0in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">THIS ELEVENTH SUPPLEMENTAL INDENTURE AND THE ADDITIONAL NOTES WILL BE GOVERNED BY THE LAWS OF
      THE STATE OF NEW YORK.</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: italic 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-indent: 0in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt; font-style: normal">Section 3.03&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;</font><font style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"> <i>Waiver of Jury Trial</i>.</font></p>
  <p style="font: italic 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-indent: 0in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">EACH PARTY HERETO HEREBY WAIVES, TO THE FULLEST EXTENT PERMITTED BY APPLICABLE LAW, ANY RIGHT
      IT MAY HAVE TO A TRIAL BY JURY IN RESPECT OF ANY LITIGATION DIRECTLY OR INDIRECTLY ARISING OUT OF, UNDER OR IN CONNECTION WITH THIS ELEVENTH SUPPLEMENTAL INDENTURE.</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: italic 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-indent: 0in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt; font-style: normal">Section 3.04&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><i>No Adverse Interpretation of Other Agreements</i>.</font></p>
  <p style="font: italic 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-indent: 0in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">Subject to Section 3.01, this Eleventh Supplemental Indenture may not be used to interpret any
      other indenture, loan or debt agreement of the Issuer, Parent or its Subsidiaries or of any other Person. Subject to Section 3.01, any such other indenture, loan or debt agreement may not be used to interpret this Eleventh Supplemental Indenture.</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: italic 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-indent: 0in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt; font-style: normal">Section 3.05</font><font style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"> <i>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Successors</i>.</font></p>
  <p style="font: italic 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-indent: 0in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">All agreements of the Issuer in this Eleventh Supplemental Indenture and the Additional Notes
      will bind its successors. All agreements of the Trustee in this Eleventh Supplemental Indenture will bind its successors. All agreements of each Guarantor in this Eleventh Supplemental Indenture will bind its successors, except as otherwise provided
      in Section 10.04 of the Base Indenture.</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: italic 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-indent: 0in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt; font-style: normal">Section 3.06&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;</font><font style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><i>Severability</i>.</font></p>
  <p style="font: italic 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-indent: 0in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">In case any provision in this Eleventh Supplemental Indenture or in the Additional Notes is
      invalid, illegal or unenforceable, the validity, legality and enforceability of the remaining provisions will not in any way be affected or impaired thereby.</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: italic 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-indent: 0in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt; font-style: normal">Section 3.07&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;</font><font style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><i>Counterparts</i>.</font></p>
  <p style="font: italic 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-indent: 0in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">This Eleventh Supplemental Indenture may be executed in any number of counterparts and by the
      parties hereto in separate counterparts, each of which when so executed will be deemed to be an original and all of which taken together will constitute one and the same agreement. The exchange of copies of this Eleventh Supplemental Indenture and of
      signature pages by electronic (including PDF) transmission shall constitute effective execution and delivery of this Eleventh Supplemental Indenture as to the parties hereto and may be used in lieu of the original Eleventh Supplemental Indenture for
      all purposes. Signatures of the parties hereto transmitted by electronic (including PDF) transmission shall be deemed to be their original signatures for all purposes.</font></p>
  <p style="FONT: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; MARGIN: 0pt 0px">&#160;</p>
  <div id="DSPFPageBreakArea" style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both; MARGIN-TOP: 10pt">
    <div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font id="DSPFPageNumber" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif; font-weight: normal; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-style: normal;">-4-</font>&#160;</div>
    <div id="DSPFPageBreak" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
      <hr noshade="noshade" style="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; MARGIN: 4px 0px; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0px; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000"> </div>
  </div>
  <p style="font: italic 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-indent: 0in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt; font-style: normal">Section 3.08</font><font style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;<i>Table of Contents, Headings, etc</i>.</font></p>
  <p style="font: italic 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-indent: 0in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">The Table of Contents and headings of the Articles and Sections of this Eleventh Supplemental
      Indenture have been inserted for convenience of reference only, are not to be considered a part of this Eleventh Supplemental Indenture and will in no way modify or restrict any of the terms or provisions hereof.</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: italic 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-indent: 0in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt; font-style: normal">Section 3.09&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;</font><font style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><i>Beneficiaries of this Eleventh Supplemental Indenture</i>.</font></p>
  <p style="font: italic 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-indent: 0in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">Nothing in this Eleventh Supplemental Indenture or in the Additional Notes, expressed or
      implied, shall give to any Person, other than the parties hereto and their successors hereunder, and the Holders of the Additional Notes, any benefit or any legal or equitable right, remedy or claim under this Eleventh Supplemental Indenture.</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: italic 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-indent: 0in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt; font-style: normal">Section 3.10</font><font style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;<i>No Personal Liability of Directors, Officers, Employees and Stockholders</i>.</font></p>
  <p style="font: italic 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-indent: 0in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">No past, present or future director, officer, member, manager, partner, employee, incorporator
      or stockholder of the Issuer or any Guarantor, as such, will have any liability for any obligations of the Issuer or the Guarantors under the Additional Notes, this Eleventh Supplemental Indenture, the Note Guarantees in respect of the Additional
      Notes, or for any claim based on, in respect of, or by reason of, such obligations or their creation. Each Holder of the Additional Notes by accepting an Additional Note waives and releases all such liability. The waiver and release are part of the
      consideration for issuance of the Additional Notes.</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: italic 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-indent: 0in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt; font-style: normal">Section 3.11&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;</font><font style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><i>The Trustee</i>.</font></p>
  <p style="font: italic 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-indent: 0in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">The Trustee shall not be responsible or liable for the validity or sufficiency of, or the
      recitals in, this Eleventh Supplemental Indenture and all of the provisions contained in the Original Indenture, in respect of the rights, privileges, immunities, powers and duties of the Trustee and the Agents shall be applicable in respect of the
      Additional Notes and of this Eleventh Supplemental Indenture as fully and with like effect as set forth in full herein.</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: center"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">[Signatures on following page]&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="FONT: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; MARGIN: 0pt 0px">&#160;</p>
  <div id="DSPFPageBreakArea" style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both; MARGIN-TOP: 10pt">
    <div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font id="DSPFPageNumber" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif; font-weight: normal; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-style: normal;">-5-</font>&#160;</div>
    <div id="DSPFPageBreak" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">

  </div>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties hereto have caused this Eleventh Supplemental Indenture to be
      duly executed, all as of the date first written above.</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 2.5in"></p>

          <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0; text-align: center"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">to</font></p>
          <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0; text-align: center"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
          <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0; text-align: center"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">INDENTURE</font></p>
          <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0; text-align: center"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
          <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0; text-align: center"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">Dated as of April 9, 2020</font></p>
          <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0; text-align: center"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
        </td>
      </tr>

  </table>

  <div style="clear: both; margin-top: 10pt; margin-bottom: 10pt; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif" id="DSPFPageBreakArea">
    <div style="text-align: center;" id="DSPFPageNumberArea"><font style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal;" id="DSPFPageNumber">i</font></div>
    <div style="page-break-after: always;" id="DSPFPageBreak">
      <hr noshade="noshade" style="margin: 4px 0px; width: 100%; border-width: 0; height: 2px; color: #000000; background-color: #000000; clear: both;"></div>
  </div>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">TWELFTH SUPPLEMENTAL INDENTURE (this &#8220;<i>Twelfth
        Supplemental Indenture</i>&#8221;), dated as of October 6, 2020 (the &#8220;<i>Series Issue Date</i>&#8221;), among T-Mobile USA, Inc., a Delaware corporation (the &#8220;<i>Issuer</i>&#8221;), T-Mobile, US, Inc., a Delaware corporation (&#8220;<i>Parent</i>,&#8221; as a guarantor), and
      the other guarantors party hereto (together with Parent, the &#8220;<i>Guarantors</i>&#8221;) and Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas, a New York banking corporation, as Trustee.</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">WHEREAS, the Issuer has heretofore executed and
      delivered an Indenture, dated as of April 9, 2020 (the &#8220;<i>Base Indenture</i>&#8221;), among the Issuer, Parent and the Trustee, providing for the issuance from time to time of one or more Series of the Issuer&#8217;s Notes;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">WHEREAS, Section 2.01 of the Base Indenture permits the
      creation of the Notes of any Series with the terms and in the form permitted in Sections 2.02 of the Base Indenture to be established in a supplemental indenture to the Base Indenture;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">WHEREAS, the Issuer has requested the Trustee to join
      with it and the Guarantors in the execution of this Twelfth Supplemental Indenture in order to supplement the Base Indenture by, among other things, establishing the forms and certain terms of a Series of Notes to be known as the Issuer&#8217;s &#8220;3.000%
      Senior Secured Notes due 2041&#8221; and adding certain provisions thereto for the benefit of the Holders of the Notes of such Series;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">WHEREAS, the Issuer has furnished the Trustee with a
      duly authorized and executed Company Order dated October 6, 2020 authorizing the execution of this Twelfth Supplemental Indenture and the issuance of the Notes established hereby; and</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">WHEREAS, all things necessary to make this Twelfth
      Supplemental Indenture a valid, binding and enforceable agreement of the Issuer, the Guarantors and the Trustee and a valid supplement to the Base Indenture have been done.</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">NOW, THEREFORE, the Issuer, the Guarantors and the
      Trustee agree as follows for the benefit of each other and for the equal and ratable benefit of the Holders of the Notes established hereby:</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0; text-transform: uppercase; text-align: center; text-indent: 0in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">Article I</font><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><br>
      <font style="font-size: 10pt">DEFINITIONS AND INCORPORATION BY REFERENCE</font></font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0; text-transform: uppercase; text-align: center; text-indent: 0in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: italic 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 1in; text-indent: 0in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt; font-style: normal">Section 1.01&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><i>Definitions.</i></font></p>
  <p style="font: italic 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 1in; text-indent: 0in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">(a) The Base Indenture, as amended and supplemented in
      respect of the Notes by this Twelfth Supplemental Indenture is collectively referred to as the &#8220;<i>Indenture</i>.&#8221; All capitalized terms which are used herein and not otherwise defined herein are defined in the Base Indenture and are used herein with
      the same meanings as in the Base Indenture. If a capitalized term is defined both in the Base Indenture and this Twelfth Supplemental Indenture, the definition in this Twelfth Supplemental Indenture shall apply to the Notes established hereby (and
      any Note Guarantee in respect thereof).</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">(b) Section 1.01 of the Base Indenture shall be amended
      to add new definitions thereto in appropriate alphabetical sequence, replace certain definitions in their entirety and to modify certain definitions, as follows:</font></p>
  <div style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><br>
  </div>
  <div style="clear: both; margin-top: 10pt; margin-bottom: 10pt; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif" id="DSPFPageBreakArea">
    <div style="page-break-after: always;" id="DSPFPageBreak">
      <hr noshade="noshade" style="margin: 4px 0px; width: 100%; border-width: 0; height: 2px; color: #000000; background-color: #000000; clear: both;"></div>
  </div>
  <!--PROfilePageNumberReset%Num%2%-%-%-->
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">(i) With respect to this Series of Notes, the following
      definitions shall be added to Section 1.01 of the Base Indenture:</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#8220;<i>Existing T-Mobile Secured Notes</i>&#8221; means the U.S.
      dollar-denominated senior secured notes issued by the Issuer on April 9, 2020 and June 24, 2020, as amended, restated, modified, renewed, refunded, replaced (whether upon or after termination or otherwise) or refinanced (including, in each case, by
      means of sales of debt securities) in whole or in part from time to time.</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">(ii) With respect to this Series of Notes, the
      definition of &#8220;Registration Rights Agreement&#8221; shall be replaced in its entirety with the following definition:</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#8220;<i>Registration Rights Agreement</i>&#8221; means (i) the
      Registration Rights Agreement, dated as of the Issue Date, among the Issuer, Parent, the Subsidiary Guarantors, Barclays Capital Inc., J.P. Morgan Securities LLC, Morgan Stanley &amp; Co. LLC and RBC Capital Markets, LLC, for themselves and as
      representative of the initial purchasers, as such agreement may be amended, modified or supplemented from time to time and (ii) with respect to the issuance of Notes of any Series issued after the Issue Date and issued in a transaction exempt from
      the registration requirements of the Securities Act, the registration rights agreement, if any, among the Issuer, any guarantors party thereto and the initial purchasers of such Series of Notes.</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">(iii) With respect to this Series of Notes, Article I
      of the Base Indenture shall be amended as follows:</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">(1) The definition of &#8220;<i>First Priority Debt Documents</i>&#8221;
      shall be amended by replacing the words &#8220;Bridge Credit Documents&#8221; with the words &#8220;Bridge Credit Agreement Documents.&#8221;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">(2) The definition of &#8220;<i>First Priority Notes</i>&#8221;
      shall be amended by adding &#8220;(including, for the avoidance of doubt, the Existing T-Mobile Secured Notes)&#8221; at the end thereof.</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">(3) Clause (8) of paragraph (b) of the definition of &#8220;<i>Indebtedness</i>&#8221;
      shall be amended to replace the word &#8220;Borrower&#8221; with the word &#8220;Issuer.&#8221;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">(4) Clause (3) of the definition of &#8220;<i>Investment
        Grade Event</i>&#8221; shall be replaced in its entirety with the following: &#8220;the (i) guarantees by, or direct obligation of, the Guarantors with respect to the Credit Agreement and the Existing T-Mobile Secured Notes have been released or would be
      released simultaneously with an Investment Grade Event Election and (ii) Liens securing the Obligations under the Existing T-Mobile Secured Notes and the Obligations under the Credit Agreement (including related secured interest rate agreements) have
      been released or would be released simultaneously with an Investment Grade Event Election.&#8221;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">(5) The definition of &#8220;<i>Notes Documents</i>&#8221; shall be
      amended to (i) insert the words &#8220;the Existing T-Mobile Secured Notes, the guarantees of the Existing T-Mobile Secured Notes,&#8221; after the words &#8220;the Note Guarantees,&#8221; and (ii) insert the words &#8220;and the Existing T-Mobile Secured Notes&#8221; after the words
      &#8220;or documents entered into in connection with the Notes&#8221;.</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">(6) Clause (7) of the definition of &#8220;<i>Permitted Liens</i>&#8221;
      shall be amended to replace the words &#8220;date of the consummation of the Merger&#8221; with the words &#8220;Series Issue Date&#8221;.</font></p>
  <div style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><br>
  </div>
  <div style="clear: both; margin-top: 10pt; margin-bottom: 10pt; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif" id="DSPFPageBreakArea">
    <div style="text-align: center;" id="DSPFPageNumberArea"><font style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal;" id="DSPFPageNumber">-2-</font></div>
    <div style="page-break-after: always;" id="DSPFPageBreak">
      <hr noshade="noshade" style="margin: 4px 0px; width: 100%; border-width: 0; height: 2px; color: #000000; background-color: #000000; clear: both;"></div>
  </div>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">(7) Clause (12) of the definition of &#8220;<i>Permitted
        Liens</i>&#8221; shall be amended to delete the words &#8220;(including the Notes and the Note Guarantees and loans outstanding under the Bridge Credit Agreement)&#8221;.</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">(8) The definition of &#8220;<i>Transactions</i>&#8221; shall be
      amended by replacing the word &#8220;Notes&#8221; with the words &#8220;$19.0 billion of Existing T-Mobile Secured Notes on April 9, 2020&#8221; immediately before the words &#8220;in connection with the refinancing of the Bridge Credit Agreement and the use of proceeds thereof&#8221;
      in clause (vi) thereof.</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">(9) The definition of &#8220;<i>Unsecured SPV Holdco</i>&#8221;
      shall be amended by adding the words &#8220;the obligations under the Existing T-Mobile Secured Notes and&#8221; after the words &#8220;other than a Guarantee that is subordinated in right of payment to such SPV Holdco&#8217;s Guarantee of&#8221;.</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: italic 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 1in; text-indent: 0in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt; font-style: normal">Section 1.02&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><i>Other Definitions.</i></font></p>
  <p style="font: italic 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 1in; text-indent: 0in"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: italic 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 1in; text-indent: 0in"></p>
  <table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="width: 100%; font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; border-collapse: collapse">

        <td style="width: 40%; text-align: right; font-family: Times New Roman,Times,serif;"><u><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt"><b>Defined in Section</b></font></u></td>
      </tr>

      <tr style="vertical-align: top; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif">

      <tr style="vertical-align: top; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif">

        <td><font style="font-size: 10pt;"><i>&#8220;Twelfth Supplemental Indenture&#8221;</i></font></td>
        <td>&#160;</td>
